amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of State to ensure that adequate resources are allocated to the Office of Defense Trade Controls for the purpose of reviewing and processing export license applications in a thorough and timely manner.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 8 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to require the Secretary of State ensure that adequate resources are allocated to the Office of Defense Trade Controls for the purpose of reviewing and processing export license applications in a thorough and timely manner.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
